name: Jupyter Datascience Notebook Stack
description: The Jupyter Notebook is a web application that allows you to create and share documents that contain live code, equations, visualizations and explanatory text. Uses include: data cleaning and transformation, numerical simulation, statistical modeling, machine learning and much more.
short_description: Interactive data science and scientific computing
instance_information: Jupyter is an open-source web application that allows users to create and share documents containing live code, equations, visualizations, and narrative text, commonly used for data analysis and scientific computing.
